MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH32 and EH39 postcode areas of Longniddry and North Berwick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:42am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a grounded overhead electricity line near Ballencrieff Mains and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:46PM on Monday, 29 March 2021.
